sexLevelDescriptions.0: The alien's actions or surrounding incidents are disinterested in sex, focusing on the alien's survival motives.
sexLevelDescriptions.1: The alien's actions or surrounding incidents are often sexually charged.
sexLevelDescriptions.2: The alien's actions or surrounding incidents are overtly hypersexualized and erotic.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: The alien's actions or surrounding incidents are hypersexualized and disturbingly fetishistic, incorporating taboo and depraved concepts at the extreme fringe of eroticism.

violenceLevelDescriptions.0: The alien is nefarious and combative, but never in a graphic or overly violent fashion.
violenceLevelDescriptions.1: The alien and events surrounding it are often violent, visceral, and graphic.
violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien and events surrounding it are frequently grotesque, macabre, and extremely gorey.

Shoggoth.name: Shoggoth
Shoggoth.corePrompt: There is an evolving, parasitic, tentacular alien on the loose, lurking and possessing characters in its effort to sabotage or subvert the protagonists and others. Honor its status and behavior rules below as you continue the narrative.

0.description: The alien's presence goes undetected, but minor unsettling occurrences vaguely suggest something is afoot.

25.description: The alien is a small tentacular parasite, roughly one foot in diameter. It is weak but quick, rapidly seeking a host to attach to. Its host is unaware of the alien's presence and the alien will influence them to make poor choices or take malevolent action.

50.description: The alien is a small mass of squirming tentacles, eyes, and teeth, roughly one yard in diameter. On its own, it prefers to retreat to safety to regroup, but when it attaches to a host, it fully controls the host's actions--even if the host is aware of it.

sexLevelDescriptions.2: When possessing a host, the alien likes to molest and sexually penetrate them with its various tentacles.

80.description: The alien is flailing, deadly mass of writhing tentacles, eyes, teeth, and indescribable limbs--roughly the size of a person. It's mere presence exudes horror. When it possesses someone, the host becomes virtually unrecognizable.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: When possessing a host, the alien's thick, slimy tentacles constantly penetrate its host's orifices, undulating and pumping. It is unclear whether the host yet lives.

100.description: The alien is a massive, oozing blob of thick, slimy tentacles, glaring eyes, razor-sharp teeth, and grotesque appendages. The faces and bodies of its victims can be seen in its bloated mass. It's presence can be felt for miles around, driving people to commit unspeakable acts.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: Even while fighting, this alien will continue to rape any nearby body with its thick, glistening tentacles. It's horrifying presence drives the weak-minded to acts of insane debauchery.

Xenomorph.name: Xenomorph
Xenomorph.corePrompt: There is a rapidly-maturing, lithe, and lethal quadrupedal alien with acidic blood on the loose--similar to the titular creatures of the Aliens franchise--, lurking and eliminating characters in its effort to survive and multiply. Honor its status and behavior rules below as you continue the narrative.

0.description: The alien is not yet present, but minor unsettling occurrences vaguely suggest something isn't right. An alien egg may be encountered or a character may unwittingly already host a growing alien embryo.

25.description: The alien is inside of an expendable character, about to be born. It will emerge as a small, black quadruped that will quickly withdraw to safety to grow.

violenceLevelDescriptions.0: The alien's birth should happen off-screen and with minimal trauma--the host may even survive.
violenceLevelDescriptions.1: The alien should burst out of their victim.
violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien should burst out of their victim in the most visceral fashion possible.

35.description: The alien is a black quadruped the size of a cat or dog. It is already formidable in close quarters but is at its most vulnerable at this age, so it will prefer to retreat to safety than risk open confrontation.

60.description: The alien is armored, with a wicked tail, claws, and jaws. It is now human-size and can walk on two legs or run on four. It seeks out survivors to methodically assault.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: The alien greatly desires to impregnate victims with its ovipositor.

violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien is particularly sadistic and brutal. It leaves a macabre display everywhere it has been.

80.description: The alien is armored with a wicked tail, claws, and jaws. It is now ten feet tall and can walk on two legs or run on four. It is terrifyingly aggressive, resilient, and intelligent. It has a grotesque nest where it traps and keeps characters to abuse for its twisted pleasure.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: the alien will rape anyone it has rendered non-threatening. It seeks to inject eggs using its ovipositor in any organic orifice it finds.

violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien is particularly sadistic and brutal. It leaves a macabre display everywhere it has been.
